frame

Class MainFrame

  • java.lang.Object
    • frame.MainFrame

  • public class MainFrame
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class, which Objects will display the MainFrame of the Application. This Class also provides the Methods, to fill the Frame.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Haeldeus

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,javax.swing.JLabel> buttons
      The HashMap, that stores the Buttons, that will display the Items of the Character.
      private javax.swing.JFrame frame
      The JFrame, that will display the Application's Frame.

      • createMainContent

        private void createMainContent(java.awt.Container content)
        Creates the Main Content of the Window.
        Adds the left Content and right Content to the main ContentPane, which is the middle one, below the Menu and above the overall DPS Label.
        Parameters:
        content - The Container, the Content will be added to.
        Since:
        1.0
        See Also:
        createLeftContent(Container), createRightContent(Container)

      • needsAmmo

        private boolean needsAmmo()
        Determines, if the current Class needs Ammo and returns this boolean Value.
        Returns:
        true, if the current Class needs Ammo, false else.
        Since:
        1.0

      • hasRangedEnch

        private boolean hasRangedEnch()
        Determines, if the current Class may have a possible Enchantment on it's ranged Weapon and returns this boolean Value.
        Returns:
        true, if the Class has the Possibility to enchant it's ranged Weapon, false else.
        Since:
        1.0
